yarangi.graphics.quadraturin
Class Scene

java.lang.Object
  yarangi.graphics.quadraturin.Scene
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserActionListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
DummyScene
public abstract class Scene
extends Object
implements UserActionListener

Represents current engine task. Scene is composed of two layers:

  • UIVeil responsible to draw and animate user interface control elements.
  • WorldVeil responsible to draw and animate game world. Veils provide a way to add and remove SceneEntity objects. Scene class encapsulates veil handling and provides the engine and user a single point of entry.

    Author:
    dveyarangi
